name: HRS: devil game I
description:
"About This Game"

You are inside a maze, you have to get out from it, but be careful, a set of devils there!!!
"Why...Why!!" those are final words in one round good luck and let's see you moving with skeletons and ghosts or trying kill all of them before destroy yourself. The game has many things including skins, weapons, hats and a lot of things. And also it is horror multiplayer/single player game.

We are presents this game to see you playing and challenge with you friends and family and this game has many modes and features are making the game more funny and making you excited to play for example it has a "finding mode" and this mode which let you know what the first one who gets the key and opening doors to arrive to the win box and when you win in every mode it will give you gifts and player skins and we have a lot of modes are the same as the first mode but for each have Different ideas.
Remember: IN each map there is a one mode so you can't choose mode..


It will start with 2 modes but with updates it will be at max 7 modes

The game has a lot of maps you can play with,
